title: My client hard-freezes when I enter Champ Select. Any solutions?
body: So during these past couple days, my client would hard-freeze upon enter the draft, which forces me to dodge and lose lp and it's already happened to me like 3-4 times. Any help is appreciated. I've already lost about 50 lp cause of this problem and have had the 30 minute queue ban a couple times now.

replies.body: There's a chance that something could be blocking your network from being able to make a solid connection to the game server you would have been playing on. Let's adjust a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if that can smooth out those champion selects.  Test it out in a custom or practice game, but hit me back if you're still having problems!
Lol.... Why would an unstable network connection cause a game to _completely hard freeze_.... Sweet lord.
